parsed.explanation: The XML had inconsistent tag naming for prices. Throughout the document, most price elements used the tag 'PRIZE' but the correct tag should be 'PRICE' for consistency and proper XML structure. I corrected all 18 instances of the 'PRIZE' tag to 'PRICE', including fixing one instance where the closing tag was already correctly spelled as '</PRICE>' but the opening tag was '</PRIZE>'. The special characters (√°, √¤, √†, √ü) have been preserved as they appear to be intentional historical typography markers.
